title.rendered: Resident Evil: Welcome to Raccoon City

content.rendered:
The headquarters of the pharmaceutical giant Umbrella Corporation was once a vibrant, bustling city. Racoon City is now an abandoned, uninhabited wasteland. On the surface. But deep down, something is being prepared that is stronger and more evil than anything the factory has unleashed on the world so far. And if it starts, it could mean the end of the inhabitants of the already suffering land. But there are some survivors who refuse to give their skins cheaply. And they suspect that if they can get into Umbrella’s underground headquarters and find some of the company’s feared secrets about the infection that has escaped, they might be able to confront the evil.

Director: Johannes Roberts

Writer: Johannes Roberts

Stars: Kaya Scodelario. Robbie Amell. Hannah John-Kamen
